text: I do use them all the time, my method right now while tedious is to use hubl vars and fallback to that whenever I use a var(). unfortunately it is limiting but i haven’t found a polyfill worth using
Until someone can come up with a good polyfill or until we can drop full support for IE, unfortunately that’s probably what we have to do

so bad...
I was hoping for nice solution so we could use only CSS vars in the CM CSS tab

ahh yea that’s a good use case.

I know it’s not a good consolation, but you could write your css in scss on codepen and copy it over. so you get some of the benefits of custom properties, (since you can’t use hubl in the css pane).

If you ever find a great polyfill for it, please definitely do post it I would love that

yup, TY for the tip.
I think I am going to handle the basic fallback with a macro. 
And for CMs I will add a new style tag in the head with JS (so it will be loaded only once even if you use more than one instance)

but even that, we won't have custom properties and we still limiting the CSS vars..
I really hope IE dies soon!
